attributes.action: Ban all types of shock collars and prong collars for dogs world wide
attributes.additional_details: Remove the shock collars and prong collars from shops and homes and to ban them world wide if any are still being used take them to court, fine them and remove the collars from the users
attributes.background: Shock collars and prong collars causes injuries to dogs by putting holes in the dogs necks this is dangerous and can cause death to dogs it is inhumane and abusesive equipment towards dogs these need to be removed from all shops and to be distroyed

rejection.details: The UK Government is only responsible for policy within the UK, but you may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584842
